title: Norman Drake
text:
Norman Percy Drake (7 July 1912 – 16 November 1972) was a British <a href="Sport%20of%20athletics">athlete</a>. 
Athletics career.
He competed in the men's <a href="hammer%20throw">hammer throw</a> at the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a> and the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a>.
He represented <a href="England%20at%20the%201934%20British%20Empire%20Games">England</a> at the <a href="1934%20British%20Empire%20Games">1934 British Empire Games</a> in the hammer throw and 16 years later was part of the <a href="England%20at%20the%201950%20British%20Empire%20Games">England</a> team at the <a href="1950%20British%20Empire%20Games">1950 British Empire Games</a> in <a href="Auckland">Auckland</a>, New Zealand, where he competed in the hammer and shot put.
